name: @onescreener/meteor-auth0-lock
description: Use the Auth0 lock widget to log into a meteor app from another origin (e.g. landing page)

scripts.build: rm -r -f lib && parcel build src/index.js -d lib --target browser --no-source-maps && npm version minor
